texts.name: Mihai Viteazu
texts.biography: Mihai Viteazul was the Voivode of Wallachia (1593–1601), of Transylvania (1599–1600), and of Moldavia (1600), the three Romanian principalitiesnote 1 being joined under his reign for a short period of time.

specialty.description: Receives a 5% per level bonus to Resistance skill percentage.
